channel.title: [PI] Removing ring puts 12 duplicates of the ring in my inventory
channel.description:
When I attempt to remove a ring from my equipped items, it puts twelve of the rings in my inventory.
Any help is appreciated.
Edit: Any of the items I remove gives me different amounts in my inventory.
